translation: Zmanuk qsm, (zmanh nishhi chuh murad guzryvmut zmanh thi, th guzruvun zmanh thi. Aamhi kh qasmuk mṭlb chuh yih zi tvarykh thi chhe gvah th yus zmanh vonụ̄ guzran chuh suthi chuh shhadt divan zi so kth chhe brḥq yosh brvntth kun byan chhe spdan)
Sivae tim lukh yimav ayman avn, th nyk aʿmal rvudụ̄ kran, th akh akis rvudụ̄ ḥqch nṣyḥt th ṣbruk tlqyn kran.
